page.description: The UI_GET_FONTNAME() function displays the Select Fontname dialog box.. Prompt for a fontname

argument.name: title
argument.description: Optional. Default = "elect Fontname". The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: default_font
argument.description: Optional. Default = none. The default font selection.

argument.name: style
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The style of the display. "" = dialog box, "a" = drop-down list
